question: A friend of yours is thinking about applying for the same course that you did at university. He/she has asked for your advice about studying this subject.Write a letter to your friend. In your letter,give details of the course you took at the universityexplain why you recommend the universitygive some advice about how to applyWrite at least 150 words.
text: I'm delighted to know that you're thinking about applying for Engineering at Imperial College where I graduated from. I'm more than happy to assist you in every possible way.

If you want to know about my course, I had taken Computer Science as my specialization subject. Overall the quality of the course exceeded my expectations and it taught me in detail about the tips and techniques to write good programs. We were taught more than 4 programming languages as well as the theoretical aspects behind them.

I'd recommend Imperial's because it is among the top 10 universities in India. It has the most experienced faculties, particularly in Computer Science and the most interesting part is you can modify your subjects based on your preference.

If you decide to apply, I'd recommend you  start preparing right away. The entrance tests are quite competitive and you must submit your application by the first week of November. Don't forget to prepare your reference letters as you need them during your admissions.
All the best and please don't hesitate to contact me for any information you need.
